mods.tableOfContents: Part I - The Calm Serenity of Night -- Ave Verum Corpus / Imant Raminsh (b. 1943) -- Jesu Dulcis Memoria / Tomás Luis de Victoria (c. 1548-1611) -- Calme Des Nuits / Camille Saint-Saëns (1835-1921) -- Part II - The Joy and Fullness of Night -- El Grillo / Josquin des Prez (c. 1450-1521) -- My Spirit is Uncaged (featuring Rob Curtis, piano) / Paul Rardin (b. 1965) -- Misericordias Domini / Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (1756-1791) -- Cantique de Jean Racine / Gabriel Fauré (1845-1924) -- Part III - The Romance of Night -- Mother I Will Have a Husband / Thomas Vautor (c. 1580-?) -- Nachtwache I, Op. 104, No. 1 / Johannes Brahms (1833-1887) -- Nachtwache II, Op. 104, No. 2 / Johannes Brahms (1833-1887) -- Sure on This Shining Night (feautring Rob Curtis, piano) / Morten Lauridsen (b. 1943)
